title: Grilled chicken pesto with rocket salad
ingredients: ['2 small skinless chicken breast fillets', '2 teaspoons pesto', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '2 handfuls rocket leaves', '1/2 red onion, sliced', 'Parmesan cheese shavings, to garnish', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar']
